name: SBIR and STTR awards funding, by type of award: Selected years, FYs 1983–2018
description: SBIR and STTR awards funding, by type of award: Selected years, FYs 1983–2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Number of awards and funding in millions of dollars

notes: The first SBIR program awards were made in FY 1983. The first STTR program award was made in FY 1995. Funding data are awarded amount through FY 2014; obligated amount in FY 2015 and later.
sources: Small Business Administration, SBIR/STTR official website, accessed 5 June 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
